comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body:
Thanks selckin!

I had to generalize the check I committed for LUCENE-3572 to catch any embedded SlowMultiReaderWrappers...

Fix for LUCENE-3578, the ability to specify order for complex phrase queries
